import{LOGIN_USER,LOGIN_SUCCESS,LOGOUT_USER,LOGOUT_USER_SUCCESS,API_ERROR,SOCIAL_LOGIN,ROLE_ACCESS_API_CALL,ROLE_ACCESS_API_CALL_SUCCESS,ROLE_ACCESS_API_UPDATE_SUCCESS,GET_USER_DETAILS_AFTER_LOGIN,GET_USER_DETAILS_AFTER_LOGIN_SUCCESS,DESISION_DEROPDOWN_SUCCESS_AFTER_LOGIN,GET_SUPER_ADMIN_API,GET_SUPER_ADMIN_API_SUCCESS}from"./actionTypes";export var loginUser=function loginUser(user,history){return{type:LOGIN_USER,payload:{user:user,history:history}};};export var loginSuccess=function loginSuccess(user){return{type:LOGIN_SUCCESS,payload:user};};export var logoutUser=function logoutUser(history){return{type:LOGOUT_USER,payload:{history:history}};};export var logoutUserSuccess=function logoutUserSuccess(){return{type:LOGOUT_USER_SUCCESS,payload:{}};};export var apiError=function apiError(error){return{type:API_ERROR,payload:error};};export var socialLogin=function socialLogin(data,history,type){return{type:SOCIAL_LOGIN,payload:{data:data,history:history,type:type}};};export var getUserDetailsAction=function getUserDetailsAction(id){return{type:GET_USER_DETAILS_AFTER_LOGIN,id:id};};export var divisionDropdownSelectSuccess=function divisionDropdownSelectSuccess(data){return{type:DESISION_DEROPDOWN_SUCCESS_AFTER_LOGIN,payload:data};};export var getUserDetailsActionSuccess=function getUserDetailsActionSuccess(data){return{type:GET_USER_DETAILS_AFTER_LOGIN_SUCCESS,payload:data};};export var roleAceessAction=function roleAceessAction(id1,id2,id3){return{type:ROLE_ACCESS_API_CALL,id1:id1,id2:id2,id3:id3};};export var roleAceessActionSuccess=function roleAceessActionSuccess(data){return{type:ROLE_ACCESS_API_CALL_SUCCESS,payload:data};};export var RoleAccessUpdateSuccess=function postSuperAdminSuccess=function postSuperAdminSuccess(data){return{type:GET_SUPER_ADMIN_API_SUCCESS,payload:data};};
